biotools.summary: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | A graphical tool for generating hybrid ground-truth spiking data for evaluating spike sorting performance | SHYBRID is a graphical user interface that allows for the easy creation of hybrid ground truth extracellular recordings. This README file contains information on how to install the program, as well as information on how to get started making extracellular spiking ground truth data. If you have any further questions feel free to contact me
